info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 5 at 8:07PM MDT until August 6 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Grand Junction CO
info.description:
* AFFECTED AREA...In Utah, Fire Weather Zone 485 Eastern Ashley National Forest.
* TIMING...For the first Red Flag Warning, from 11 AM to 8 PM MDT Wednesday. For the second Red Flag Warning, from 11 AM to 8 PM MDT Thursday. For the third Red Flag Warning, from 11 AM to 8 PM MDT Friday.
* WINDS...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 40 mph.
* RELATIVE HUMIDITY...10 to 15 percent.
* IMPACTS...Fires will catch and spread quickly. Exercise extreme caution with any outdoor burning.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

parameter.value: RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 485... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MDT THURSDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 485... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MDT FRIDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 485
